title: Experiments in three colour separation
brief_description: A documentary of the work of Arthur and Corinne Cantrill since 1975 in 3-colour separation. Discusses the classic theories and principles in 3-colour separation in film and photography. Commentary by Arthur Cantrill.
description: A documentary of the work of Arthur and Corinne Cantrill since 1975 in 3-colour separation. Discusses the classic theories and principles in 3-colour separation in film and photography. Commentary by Arthur Cantrill.
